attributes.action: Help protect children from being sexually abused, trafficked and murdered.
attributes.additional_details: I want the gov to do this because children should be allowed to be children. Let them live innocent lives and be free to play on their streets, parks etc without parents being too afraid to leave their sides. Let children be free. Help Save the children. Their lives matter too. Together we can stop traumatised little souls and bring them peace and innocence back.
attributes.background: The government should protect children with all their might. Save these innocent souls from being traumatised by vile human beings trafficking, abusing in all ways and murdering them. These crimes should bring dealth penalties.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about crimes against children, but we can only accept petitions that make a clear request for action by the UK Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and rapists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all crimes against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/467154

If you would like the Government to make a change not covered by the above petitions you could start a new petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear what changes you want the Government to make.
